SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = ic.user_id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, temp.price_discount as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id as itemId, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) temp on i.id = temp.itemId where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
temp.price_discount asc
i.item_name desc

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, temp.price_discount as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id as itemId, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) temp on i.id = temp.itemId where ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
temp.price_discount asc
i.item_name desc

select ti.id as itemId, tii.url as itemImgUrl, ti.item_name as itemName, tis.id as specId, tis.name as specName, tis.price_discount as priceDiscount, tis.price_normal as priceNormal from items_spec tis left join items ti on ti.id = tis.item_id left join items_img tii on tii.item_id = tis.item_id where tii.is_main = 1 and tis.id in
#{specId}
